title: pbe account
body:
ok so i signed up for pbe and my acc is on but if i start playing on pbe with my main acc the one that is on does it turn into an pbe acount and can it still play on normal league?
pls help
pls

replies.body: I wasn't able to find PBE access on this account. Were you meaning the Alpha Client? If so, they are completely different systems and you can access both the Alpha Client and the regular one, freely switching between the two.
